overview:
Gary Zhou has spent over 13 years building businesses in the technology industry and establishing himself as a successful entrepreneur. He is recognized as a dynamic, hard-charging and results-focused operations, entrepreneur and business development leader with a demonstrated track record of driving leading-edge start-up operations, product management, channel development and strategic partnerships for new companies in the retail and technology sectors. At the age of 13, Gary started and operated a highly successfully online music network including the most popular fan websites dedicated to the hottest musical brands at the time. After finding a successful exit in 2002, Gary founded ION Hosting to provide cost effective, shared hosting services in a UNIX-based LAMP environment and grew his customer base to over 1,500 accounts in 56 countries. Transitioned from ION Hosting to ION-E and launched SaaS products & services for a more competitive clientele; led development of cutting edge Enterprise Framework providing solutions for key real estate & mortgage industry clients allowing for greater control of corporate branding & compliance, recruiting & retention, lead management, centralized content management & distribution, and workflow optimization. Focused marketing and outreach efforts on mid to enterprise level real estate & mortgage companies, enabling clients to manage all their digital assets across the organization.

Currently, Gary is the founder and key advisor to multiple business ventures including ION-E, ION Hosting, WeatherTrends International, Delaware Mailboxes, and The UPS Store. Gary is highly intuitive with deep insight into global market perspectives, cultural diversity factors, go-to-market strategies, and shares a strong passion in helping organizations leverage media & technology to deliver results.
